events.name: Russian air strikes on Idlib province, Syria
events.wd_label: Russian air strikes on Idlib province, Syria
events.wd_description: At least nine people were reportedly killed after Russian air strikes on the rebel-held Idlib province in Syria. The United Nations expressed concerns about the hostilities in the province.
events.description: At least nine people were reportedly killed after Russian air strikes on the rebel-held Idlib province in Syria. The United Nations expressed concerns about the hostilities in the province.

events.name: Casualties in Idlib
events.wd_description: Bombs dropped from warplanes killed nine people next to a market outside Jisr al-Shughour, and two others were killed in an air strike near Idlib city.
events.description: Bombs dropped from warplanes killed nine people next to a market outside Jisr al-Shughour, and two others were killed in an air strike near Idlib city.

events.name: Monitoring group's statement
events.wd_description: The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitoring group termed the attack the deadliest Russian attack this year.
events.description: The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitoring group termed the attack the deadliest Russian attack this year.

events.name: Russia's response
events.wd_description: Russia's military did not comment on the situation immediately. Their air campaign supporting the Syrian government has been crucial in turning the tide of the civil war.
events.description: Russia's military did not comment on the situation immediately. Their air campaign supporting the Syrian government has been crucial in turning the tide of the civil war.

events.name: Retaliation for attacks
events.wd_description: The strikes were said to be a retaliation for attacks that had killed civilians in government-held Hama and Latakia provinces.
events.description: The strikes were said to be a retaliation for attacks that had killed civilians in government-held Hama and Latakia provinces.

events.name: US promises South Korea more insight into nuclear planning
events.wd_label: US promises South Korea more insight into nuclear planning
events.wd_description: The United States has promised South Korea more insight into its nuclear planning over any conflict with North Korea.
events.description: The United States has promised South Korea more insight into its nuclear planning over any conflict with North Korea.

events.name: US-South Korea talks
events.wd_description: The announcement followed talks between US President Joe Biden and South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol, discussing North Korea, semiconductor chips, trade, and the war in Ukraine.
events.description: The announcement followed talks between US President Joe Biden and South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol, discussing North Korea, semiconductor chips, trade, and the war in Ukraine.

events.name: South Korea's commitment
events.wd_description: The deal includes South Korea's commitment not to pursue a nuclear bomb.
events.description: The deal includes South Korea's commitment not to pursue a nuclear bomb.

events.name: Bilateral consultations
events.wd_description: In the event of North Korea's nuclear attack, the US and South Korea have agreed to immediate bilateral presidential consultations and promised a swift, overwhelming, and decisive response, including the use of US nuclear weapons.
events.description: In the event of North Korea's nuclear attack, the US and South Korea have agreed to immediate bilateral presidential consultations and promised a swift, overwhelming, and decisive response, including the use of US nuclear weapons.

events.name: Deadly Wildfires Ravage Russia's Ural Highlands and Siberia
events.wd_label: Deadly Wildfires Ravage Russia's Ural Highlands and Siberia
events.wd_description: Wildfires in Russia's Ural highlands and Siberia have claimed the lives of at least 21 people, with most victims being elderly individuals unable to evacuate their homes. The fires, fueled by arid summers and high temperatures, have led to widespread destruction.
events.description: Wildfires in Russia's Ural highlands and Siberia have claimed the lives of at least 21 people, with most victims being elderly individuals unable to evacuate their homes. The fires, fueled by arid summers and high temperatures, have led to widespread destruction.

events.name: Wildfires in Ural Highlands and Siberia
events.wd_label: Wildfires in Ural Highlands and Siberia
events.wd_description: Wildfires have spread across the Ural highlands and Siberia, fueled by dry summers and high temperatures, with significant damage reported in the Kurgan and Sverdlovsk provinces and parts of Siberia.
events.description: Wildfires have spread across the Ural highlands and Siberia, fueled by dry summers and high temperatures, with significant damage reported in the Kurgan and Sverdlovsk provinces and parts of Siberia.

events.name: Death Toll and Impact on Vulnerable Populations
events.wd_label: Death Toll and Impact on Vulnerable Populations
events.wd_description: At least 21 people, many of them elderly, have perished in the wildfires, with most of the deaths occurring in the village of Yuldus in Kurgan province. The death toll is expected to rise.
events.description: At least 21 people, many of them elderly, have perished in the wildfires, with most of the deaths occurring in the village of Yuldus in Kurgan province. The death toll is expected to rise.

events.name: State of Emergency and Ongoing Threat
events.wd_label: State of Emergency and Ongoing Threat
events.wd_description: A state of emergency has been declared in Kurgan province, where over 5,000 structures have been destroyed by the fires. Thousands of hectares have also been burned in Sverdlovsk province and parts of Siberia.
events.description: A state of emergency has been declared in Kurgan province, where over 5,000 structures have been destroyed by the fires. Thousands of hectares have also been burned in Sverdlovsk province and parts of Siberia.

events.name: EV Battery Factories in Europe
events.wd_description: Europe is seeking to attract EV battery makers to build factories to cut dependency on Asia and compete with the United States in green subsidies.
events.description: Europe is seeking to attract EV battery makers to build factories to cut dependency on Asia and compete with the United States in green subsidies.

events.name: Planned Factories
events.wd_description: Overview of planned EV battery factories in Europe, including joint ventures and major investments.
events.description: Overview of planned EV battery factories in Europe, including joint ventures and major investments.

events.name: t: ACC Gigafactories
events.wd_description: Automotive Cells Company (ACC), a JV of Stellantis, Mercedes Benz, and TotalEnergies, plans to build three gigafactories with 40 GWh capacity each by 2030.
events.description: Automotive Cells Company (ACC), a JV of Stellantis, Mercedes Benz, and TotalEnergies, plans to build three gigafactories with 40 GWh capacity each by 2030.

events.name: t: Stellantis-CATL JV
events.wd_description: Stellantis aims to build a plant to produce lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries in Europe in a joint venture with CATL.
events.description: Stellantis aims to build a plant to produce lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries in Europe in a joint venture with CATL.

events.name: Factories by Country
events.wd_description: List of operating and planned EV battery factories in various European countries.
events.description: List of operating and planned EV battery factories in various European countries.

events.name: t: Belgium
events.wd_description: Avesta Battery and Energy Engineering plans to build a 40 million euro plant in Seneffe-Manage, operational before 2030 with a capacity of 3 GWh.
events.description: Avesta Battery and Energy Engineering plans to build a 40 million euro plant in Seneffe-Manage, operational before 2030 with a capacity of 3 GWh.

events.name: t: Britain
events.wd_description: Several planned factories including West Midlands Gigafactory JV, Tata Group in Somerset, Envision in Sunderland, and Nanotech Energy exploring sites.
events.description: Several planned factories including West Midlands Gigafactory JV, Tata Group in Somerset, Envision in Sunderland, and Nanotech Energy exploring sites.

events.name: t: Czechia
events.wd_description: MES operates a plant in Horni Sucha with a target output of 15 GWh.
events.description: MES operates a plant in Horni Sucha with a target output of 15 GWh.

events.name: t: Finland
events.wd_description: Finnish Minerals Group and potential partner planning a cell production plant in Kotka. Svolt shortlisted Finland for a factory with 50 GWh capacity.
events.description: Finnish Minerals Group and potential partner planning a cell production plant in Kotka. Svolt shortlisted Finland for a factory with 50 GWh capacity.

events.name: t: France
events.wd_description: Several operating and planned factories including ACC Douvrin, Blue Solutions in Quimper, Stellantis-backed Tiamat Energy, Envision in Douai, and ProLogium in Dunkirk.
events.description: Several operating and planned factories including ACC Douvrin, Blue Solutions in Quimper, Stellantis-backed Tiamat Energy, Envision in Douai, and ProLogium in Dunkirk.

events.name: t: Germany
events.wd_description: Multiple factories including Tesla in Gruenheide, CATL in Erfurt, Microvast in Ludwigsfelde, Northvolt in Heide, ACC in Kaiserslautern, Volkswagen in Salzgitter, and Cellforce in Tuebingen.
events.description: Multiple factories including Tesla in Gruenheide, CATL in Erfurt, Microvast in Ludwigsfelde, Northvolt in Heide, ACC in Kaiserslautern, Volkswagen in Salzgitter, and Cellforce in Tuebingen.

events.name: t: Hungary
events.wd_description: Samsung operates a factory in Goed, with CATL and EVE Power planning new plants in Debrecen.
events.description: Samsung operates a factory in Goed, with CATL and EVE Power planning new plants in Debrecen.

events.name: t: Italy
events.wd_description: Italvolt in Scarmagno, Romano Canavese, FAAM in Terevola, and ACC in Termoli planning new factories.
events.description: Italvolt in Scarmagno, Romano Canavese, FAAM in Terevola, and ACC in Termoli planning new factories.

events.name: t: Norway
events.wd_description: Several planned factories including FREYR in Mo i Rana, Morrow in Arendal, Beyonder in Haugaland, and Elinor in Trondheim.
events.description: Several planned factories including FREYR in Mo i Rana, Morrow in Arendal, Beyonder in Haugaland, and Elinor in Trondheim.

events.name: t: Poland
events.wd_description: LG Energy Solution operates a plant in Wroclaw targeting 115 GWh by 2025.
events.description: LG Energy Solution operates a plant in Wroclaw targeting 115 GWh by 2025.

events.name: t: Portugal
events.wd_description: CALB plans to build a factory in Sines with 15 GWh capacity by end-2025, rising to 45 GWh by 2028.
events.description: CALB plans to build a factory in Sines with 15 GWh capacity by end-2025, rising to 45 GWh by 2028.

events.name: t: Serbia
events.wd_description: ElevenES operates a facility in Subotica aiming for 48 GWh by 2027. InoBat plans a factory in Cuprija with 4 GWh initial capacity by 2025.
events.description: ElevenES operates a facility in Subotica aiming for 48 GWh by 2027. InoBat plans a factory in Cuprija with 4 GWh initial capacity by 2025.

events.name: t: Slovakia
events.wd_description: Inobat and Gotion High Tech plan to build a factory in Surany with 20 GWh capacity by 2026.
events.description: Inobat and Gotion High Tech plan to build a factory in Surany with 20 GWh capacity by 2026.

events.name: t: Spain
events.wd_description: Several planned factories including BASQUEVOLT in Basque Country, Envision in Navalmoral de la Mata, Volkswagen in Sagunto, and InoBat in Valladolid.
events.description: Several planned factories including BASQUEVOLT in Basque Country, Envision in Navalmoral de la Mata, Volkswagen in Sagunto, and InoBat in Valladolid.

events.name: t: Sweden
events.wd_description: Northvolt operates a factory in Skelleftea and plans new plants in Borlange and Gothenburg.
events.description: Northvolt operates a factory in Skelleftea and plans new plants in Borlange and Gothenburg.

events.name: t: Switzerland
events.wd_description: SCB plans to build a plant in Frauenfeld with a target of 7.6 GWh capacity by 2030.
events.description: SCB plans to build a plant in Frauenfeld with a target of 7.6 GWh capacity by 2030.
